SET(ZLIB_PUBLIC_HDRS
    zconf.h
    zlib.h
)
SET(ZLIB_PRIVATE_HDRS
    crc32.h
    deflate.h
    inffast.h
    inffixed.h
    inflate.h
    inftrees.h
    trees.h
    zutil.h
)
SET(ZLIB_SRCS
    adler32.c
    compress.c
    crc32.c
    deflate.c
    inflate.c
    infback.c
    inftrees.c
    inffast.c
    trees.c
    uncompr.c
    zutil.c
)

ADD_LIBRARY(zlib ${ZLIB_SRCS} ${ZLIB_PUBLIC_HDRS} ${ZLIB_PRIVATE_HDRS})
